sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SERTULARIA , in natural hiſtory, a genus belonging to the class of vermes, and to the order of zoophyta. The ſtem is radicated, fibrous, naked, and jointed ; the florets are hydræ, and there is one at each joint. This genus comprehends 42 ſpecies of corallines.
